root.name: Bomb Wuzel
root.description: Bomb Wuzel Bomb Wuzel is a puzzle game with strategic and tactical elements in addiction. In Bomb Wuzel is it Wuzels only job to eliminate all bombs and mines without destroying itself.In order to do the job right the wuzel must find the correct way, the best switching position or the best blowing up radius of the different explosive figure. Than he can make it.
